snippet: Bruce Springsteen's song "We Take Care of Our Own" was played immediately after President Obama's speech at the Democratic National Convention on Sept. 6. By the end of the week, the song's sales had surged 409 percent, according to Billboard, with...
abstract: Bruce Springsteen's song "We Take Care of Our Own" was played immediately after President Obama's speech at the Democratic National Convention on Sept. 6. By the end of the week, the song's sales had surged 409 percent, according to Billboard, with 2,000 downloads.

headline.print_headline: A Convention Lift For Springsteen, Too
